column4: to configure dual monitor, could i reconfigure xorg with both monitors active?  is xorg.conf the only file that chnges with dpkg-reconfigure?
Polygon, do you have the multimedia and other codecs insalled (the 'illegal' ones in us)?
yeah i have the gstreamer ugly and all of those installed.
ive had this problem ever since fiesty came out, i have rebooted many times.
